mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ( rm.menu_id ) FROM user_role ur LEFT JOIN role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT(menu.permission) FROM user_role LEFT JOIN role_menu ON user_role.role_id = role_menu.role_id LEFT JOIN menu ON role_menu.menu_id = menu.id WHERE menu.permission IS NOT NULL AND menu.permission != '' AND user_role.user_id = #{userId};
